title: Amazon Associate
job_overview:
We are looking for an Amazon Associate to join our team FT, must be able to work M-F, ET hours.

Own and manage all aspects of Amazon catalog maintenance, including listing creation, variation updates, troubleshooting, and ongoing improvements.
Lead content optimization efforts across Amazon (titles, bullets, A+ content, images, and backend search terms) to improve traffic and conversion rates.
Monitor and improve product detail page performance using tools like Helium 10, Amazon Brand Analytics, and retail readiness checklists.
Work closely with internal creative team to improve conversion content across digital marketplaces.
Stay on top of Amazon trends, best practices, and policy updates to ensure compliance and maintain brand health.
Be the go-to problem solver for listing suppressions, catalog errors, and other platform issues.
Assist with Walmart Marketplace, Target Plus, and TikTok Shop content and catalog efforts as needed.
Collaborate with advertising agency, operations, and customer service teams.
Must be highly self-motivated and proactive—comfortable taking initiative and managing projects with minimal oversight.
Ideal candidate is detail-oriented, data-savvy, and excited to help grow a brands in the eCommerce space.

Must have a minimum of 2-3 years experience working with Amazon.
